definition: Fayed (name)/Mohamed Abdel Moneim Fayed (1933-), controversial Egyptian-born businessman and philanthropist, owner of Harrods (London) and Fulham football club

sentences.english: They both have rejected Fayed's conspiracy theories.
sentences.chinese: 兩國警方都否定了法耶德的陰謀論。

sentences.english: It describes the bizarre Fayed menage.
sentences.chinese: 它描述了古怪的法耶德家族。

sentences.english: Fayed was solicitous, seeing him three or four times a week.
sentences.chinese: 法耶德很關心他，每週要見他三四次。
